languages.text: Прах Леди Теодоры, превращенный под огромным давлением в великолепный бриллиант и захороненный в корабельном склепе. Камень переливается сапфировыми оттенками с прожилками золотого и фиолетового, напоминая о фамильных цветах фон Валанциус.

Lady Theodora's ashes were subjected to immense pressure and turned into this resplendent diamond to be interred in the ship's crypt. The gemstone's sapphire hues veined with gold and purple are reminiscent of the von Valancius family colours.
languages.original_text: Прах Леди Теодоры, превращенный под огромным давлением в великолепный бриллиант и захороненный в корабельном склепе. Камень переливается сапфировыми оттенками с прожилками золотого и фиолетового, напоминая о фамильных цветах фон Валанциус.

languages.text: Les cendres de dame Théodora ont été soumises à une forte pression afin d'être transformées en cette pierre resplendissante destinée à être conservée dans la crypte du vaisseau. Les teintes saphir veinées d'or et de pourpre ne sont pas sans rappeler les couleurs de la famille von Valancius.
languages.original_text: Lady Theodora's ashes were subjected to immense pressure and turned into this resplendent diamond to be interred in the ship's crypt. The gemstone's sapphire hues veined with gold and purple are reminiscent of the von Valancius family colours.

traits.locale_text: Les cendres de dame Théodora ont été soumises à une forte pression afin d'être transformées en cette pierre resplendissante destinée à être conservée dans la crypte du vaisseau. Les teintes saphir veinées d'or et de pourpre ne sont pas sans rappeler les couleurs de la famille von Valancius.

languages.text: Las cenizas de lady Theodora se sometieron a una presión inmensa para convertirlas en este resplandeciente diamante, que se enterró en la cripta de la nave. Los tonos zafiro de la gema, veteados de oro y púrpura, recuerdan a los colores de la familia von Valancius.
languages.original_text: Lady Theodora's ashes were subjected to immense pressure and turned into this resplendent diamond to be interred in the ship's crypt. The gemstone's sapphire hues veined with gold and purple are reminiscent of the von Valancius family colours.

traits.locale_text: Las cenizas de lady Theodora se sometieron a una presión inmensa para convertirlas en este resplandeciente diamante, que se enterró en la cripta de la nave. Los tonos zafiro de la gema, veteados de oro y púrpura, recuerdan a los colores de la familia von Valancius.

languages.text: 西奥多拉夫人的骨灰在巨大的压力之下，凝结成了这枚美轮美奂的钻石，埋在船上的地下墓穴之中。这颗钻石主基调为海蓝色，上面勾勒着相互交织的金色与紫色，这不禁让人想道冯·瓦兰修斯家族的标志色彩。
languages.original_text: Lady Theodora's ashes were subjected to immense pressure and turned into this resplendent diamond to be interred in the ship's crypt. The gemstone's sapphire hues veined with gold and purple are reminiscent of the von Valancius family colours.

traits.locale_text: 西奥多拉夫人的骨灰在巨大的压力之下，凝结成了这枚美轮美奂的钻石，埋在船上的地下墓穴之中。这颗钻石主基调为海蓝色，上面勾勒着相互交织的金色与紫色，这不禁让人想道冯·瓦兰修斯家族的标志色彩。

languages.text: レディ・シオドーラの遺灰は、莫大な圧力をかけられ、輝かしいダイヤモンドとなり、船の地下墓地に埋葬された。この宝石のサファイアに金と紫が混じったような色合いは、フォン・ヴァランシウス家のファミリーカラーを彷彿とさせる。
languages.original_text: Lady Theodora's ashes were subjected to immense pressure and turned into this resplendent diamond to be interred in the ship's crypt. The gemstone's sapphire hues veined with gold and purple are reminiscent of the von Valancius family colours.

traits.locale_text: レディ・シオドーラの遺灰は、莫大な圧力をかけられ、輝かしいダイヤモンドとなり、船の地下墓地に埋葬された。この宝石のサファイアに金と紫が混じったような色合いは、フォン・ヴァランシウス家のファミリーカラーを彷彿とさせる。

languages.text: Lady Theodoras Asche wurde gewaltigem Druck ausgesetzt und in diesen strahlenden Diamanten verwandelt, um in der Krypta des Schiffs bestattet zu werden. Die saphirfarbenen Töne des Edelsteins, durchzogen von Gold und Violett, erinnern an die Farben der Familie von Valancius.
languages.original_text: Lady Theodora's ashes were subjected to immense pressure and turned into this resplendent diamond to be interred in the ship's crypt. The gemstone's sapphire hues veined with gold and purple are reminiscent of the von Valancius family colours.

traits.locale_text: Lady Theodoras Asche wurde gewaltigem Druck ausgesetzt und in diesen strahlenden Diamanten verwandelt, um in der Krypta des Schiffs bestattet zu werden. Die saphirfarbenen Töne des Edelsteins, durchzogen von Gold und Violett, erinnern an die Farben der Familie von Valancius.

languages.text: Leydi Theodora'nın külleri, çok büyük bir basınca maruz bırakıldı ve geminin mahzenine defnedilmek üzere bu göz kamaştırıcı elmasa dönüştürüldü. Taşın safir tonlarının üzerindeki altın ve mor rengi damarlar, von Valancius ailesinin renklerini anımsatıyor.
languages.original_text: Lady Theodora's ashes were subjected to immense pressure and turned into this resplendent diamond to be interred in the ship's crypt. The gemstone's sapphire hues veined with gold and purple are reminiscent of the von Valancius family colours.
